rows.title: Games
rows.message_text: This is a collection of math games for the classroom. In addition to using them in the classroom, they have some other specialized uses â€“ set the toggles to list only the kinds of games you are interested in.

rows.title: Special Uses
rows.message_text:
Tutoring: These games are good for focused practice with a particular skill......


Breaks: These are quick to set up and play games that are ideal for short breaks between longer activities......


Home: These are good games to send home for families to play together and practice the skills being learned in the classroom.

rows.title: Help
rows.message_text: If you ever want to see this introduction again, just click on the question mark.
